H0.text: In which country would you find the Plain of Jars. Thailand

H1.text: In which country would you find the Plain of Jars. Cambodia

H2.text: In which country would you find the Plain of Jars. Vietnam

H3.text: In which country would you find the Plain of Jars. Laos

A4.text: The Plain of Jars is a megalithic archaeological landscape in Laos.

A5.text: Lao and Japanese archaeologists have conducted excavations at the Plain of Jars.
